## Source: amazon-inspector (751e25d2464b2da9bfb7e629441757f1d413f8e1cf4a38522f2316ef84755e59)
The package node-calculator-b0e4 was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (a3df486d4df124c04c80090352a1b0522d55ac25c0899ac2e8c78411c1b848e1)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'node-calculator-b0e4' @ 2.1.3 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
